channel.title: The Smart Blog
channel.description: Relax and have a good read!

item.title: Timing Market Dips
item.description: With all the Coronavirus panic the DOW has been falling off a cliff the past few days: DOW plummetting to $21k based on Yahoo finance data.

item.title: My 2019 Spending
item.description: It's time to come clean. I could never live off $24,000 like my retirement calculator's estimate is based off.

item.title: One Year of Work
item.description: I've been working as a frontend build engineer for an open-source company one year now.

item.title: How v2 of this Site was Built
item.description: I ditched Gatsby. I decided to ditch Gatsby because after an update to how Gatsby's resources were loaded, my site wouldn't build anymore.

item.title: (Don't Fear) The Command Line
item.description: For many, the command line is a scary prompt that reminds people of old computers that were hard to use.

item.title: How v1 of this Site was Built
item.description: You probably don't notice, but this site is nearly as fast as it can possibly be!

item.title: How to Retire Early
item.description: Brilliant, you'd like to quit your day job and do something more meaningful with your life. Now how do you do it?

item.title: Craigslist Bike Guide
item.description: TLDR; I recently bought a bike after religiously checking Craigslist for a month, and I'd like to share the process I went through.

item.title: Is Grad School Worth it?
item.description: Today, my Aunt told me: More lucrative job opportunities await you at my company with a Master's Degree.
